full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL DBANG CHEN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I SGRUB THABS SHIN TU GSANG BA SNYAN RGYUD MKHA' 'GRO'I SNYING THIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SNGAR RANG YUL DU BOD KHAMS KYI DGON SDE'I YUL MANG POS YANG YANG BSKUL ZHING KHYAD PAR RGYAL KHAB CHEN P P'I CING PHO BRANG DU GNAM GYI LHA 'JAM DBYANGS 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I MDUN DU 'DON CHEN PO BKA' YI NANG BLON KO CHOG AAM BAN PO YAN NEM HE THU ZHE T'A WANG DPA' PO SKYABS, JO RIG THU DED T'A CHING WANG 'JIG RTEN DBANG BSKUR, AA LAG SHA CHING WANG GRO LAD SA RANG, SU NYID DU WANG MCHOG SRUNG SOGS GONG MA'I LUNG GIS ZIN PA'I BLA DPON CHEN PO'I RIGS SOGS LA 'DI'I DBANG BSKUR BGYIS SHING, NYE CHAR @013B HOR CHEN SHOG BDE 'DUS GLING, ZHONG HOR DGON BKRA SHI SPUNGS GLING, RGYA CHER DGON PA PA SOGS LA DBANG BSKUR GYI SKABS MU RU SU MA'I SHRI RE'I MER GEN MKHAN PO BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS, ZHONG HOR DGON SHRI RE THU PAndI TA THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO, GO CHOG AAM BAN CHEN PO'I SKU TSA LHA BTZUN SPRUL PA'I SKU THUB BSTAN DGE 'PHEL, SENGGE RIN CHEN WANG GI SKU MCHED KHYUNG LNGA RIN CHEN BCAS NAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSTAN PA CHOS 'PHEL DPAL BZANG PO'AM, DBANG CHEN LHA YI LUNG GIS DPAL DBANG CHEN GAR GYI DBANG PHYUG DGYES RAB RDO RJER 'BOD PAS SHAR PHYOGS @014A *, ,RGYA MTSO CHEN PO'I NYE ZUR GONG MA CHEN POS RGYA CHEN GLING DU BSNGAGS PA'I CHOS GRVA CHEN POR SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
